alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 8:52PM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with as much as 1 foot for the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. Snow forecast from 11 AM Sunday to 11 AM Monday: Payson 1 to 3 inches Pine-Strawberry 4 to 6 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
